name: Wordie
bullets: Programmed a web game where players guess a randomly selected six letter word (Angular)
Created the backend to generate a new word everyday and verify players' guesses (NodeJS)
Utilized Firebase Firestore as a database, Firestore Functions for API calls, and Firebase Hosting to deploy the website

name: MotivateMe
bullets: Built a mobile application to motivate users to complete goals by taking photos of their progress and emphasizing their growth  (Flutter/SQL)
Developed the home page of the app, which would display the user's goals for the day and allow users to mark them as complete by taking a photo
Implemented CRUD functionality and user authentication with AWS Amplify and Relational DB
Designed and improved paper/high-fidelity prototypes based on 3 rounds of user feedback (Adobe XD)
